title: assimp [dependency of dealii] build error with intel compilers on KNL
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install xsdk@develop
```

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2361261/spack-build.out.txt)

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
bash-4.2$ uname -a
Linux isdp001.cels.anl.gov 3.10.0-862.11.6.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Aug 14 21:49:04 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
bash-4.2$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core) 
bash-4.2$ 
``` 

[compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2361266/compilers.yaml.txt)
[packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2361268/packages.yaml.txt)

### Additional information

Does this package build with intel compilers?

I guess I should build dealii without assimp for xsdk

```diff
diff --git a/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/xsdk/package.py b/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/xsdk/package.py
-    depends_on('dealii@develop~python~doc~slepc~gmsh+petsc+mpi+trilinos~int64+hdf5~netcdf+metis', when='@develop')
+    depends_on('dealii@develop~assimp~python~doc~slepc~gmsh+petsc+mpi+trilinos~int64+hdf5~netcdf+metis', when='@develop')

```

cc: @bangerth @Rombur @davydden
